contentencoded:
Workers at Volkswagen's Tennessee factory are expected to hear this week about a bid to give them a greater voice with management.  The move would give a small foothold to unions at a typically non-unionized car plant.

The BBC's Steve Evans in Berlin joins Marketplace host David Brancaccio to discuss.
